pkgmetadata.longdescription: Buckley-James Regression for Survival Data with High-Dimensional Covariates // Buckley-James regression for right-censoring survival data with high-dimensional covariates. Implementations for survival data include boosting with componentwise linear least squares, componentwise smoothing splines, regression trees and MARS. Other high-dimensional tools include penalized regression for survival data. See Wang and Wang (2010) doi:10.2202/1544-6115.1550.
